name: Robot Run&Shot
description:
Earth 2288, Artificial Intelligence have take the control of the world to destroy human race. You pilot the last human hope : the Robotector

Fly as far as you can in this endless running game and shoot enemies to increase your high score and save the world! But take care to your energy level or you have to stop your robot on the ground to restore your energy.

Main features :

  • endless level generation
  • multiple ennemis type
  • multiple traps
  • bonus items
  • high score and stats
